attributes.action: ensure that all 60 recommendations in Sir Christopher Kelly's proposal for the reform of MPs' expenses are implemented in full.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The public are utterly disgusted with the way in which nearly half our MPs have fiddled their expenses in order to line their own pockets at our, the taxpayers', expense. Sir Christopher Kelly and his team have spent seven months producing excellent proposals to reform the corrupt system and restore our confidence in parliament and our elected representatives. His 60 recommendations must be implemented in full. 

Grahame Leon-Smith, Party Leader Senior Citizens Party

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament and the IPSA to implement.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
